name: Autumn's Orchard
description:
Autumn Orchard - Cosy Fall Jam 2022

Cookie Clicker inspired Game about Replanting the Magical Autumn Orchard

buying the fertilizer buckets increases picked apple multiplier by 1

Each brought tree gives 10 apples every 6 seconds

controls = either mouse or touch - click the interactable items with text

Thank You for Playing!

all assets and art used are either created or owned by me.
